name: Graviture
description:
Graviture is a single-player, action focused, 2D platformer, where you must navigate through the laboratory’s complex facility, fighting enemies with telekinetic and gravity wrapping powers to reach the exit.
Gain more powers by progressing through the cruel experimental laboratory; the farther you go into the facility, the more powers are at your disposal.

Credits:

  • Trevor Torres
  • Shawn Rogers 
  • Dylan Loe 
  • Jeremy Casada 
  • Atley Sakamoto

System Requirements:

  • GeForce 900 series card or AMD equivalent
  • 4gb ram
  • 500mb storage

Number of players:

1
